trans-unit.source: Raises a <xref href="System.Data.DataTableCollection.CollectionChanged"></xref> event when a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> is added to or removed from the <xref href="System.Data.DataTableCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gera um <xref href="System.Data.DataTableCollection.CollectionChanged"> </xref> eventos quando um <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> é adicionado ou removido o <xref href="System.Data.DataTableCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.
